00041 void affx::File5_open()
00042 {
00043   // printf("### File5_start():\n");
00044   H5open();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void affx::File5_close()
00048 {
00049   // printf("### File5_close():\n");
00050 #ifdef FILE5_DEBUG_USAGE
00051   // print the list if any objects havent been deleted.
00052   affx::file5_usecnt_print();
00053 #endif
00054   //
00055   H5close();
00056 }

00060 affx::File5_Object::File5_Object()
00061 {
00062   init();
00063 #ifdef FILE5_DEBUG_USAGE
00064   file5_usecnt_inc(this);
00065 #endif
00066 }
00067 
00068 affx::File5_Object::~File5_Object()
00069 {
00070 #ifdef FILE5_DEBUG_USAGE
00071   file5_usecnt_dec(this);
00072 #endif
00073   //
00074   close();
00075   setParent(NULL);
00076 }

00078 affx::File5_return_t
00079 affx::File5_Object::init()
00080 {
00081   m_parent=NULL;
00082   m_file=NULL;
00083   //
00084   m_name="";
00085   m_errno=0;
00086   m_flags=0;
00087   m_dirty=0;
00088   m_refcnt=0;
00089   m_state=affx::FILE5_STATE_CLOSED;
00090   //
00091   m_readonly=true;
00092   //
00093   m_opt_chunksize=-1; // 
00094   m_opt_compress=-1; // our default
00095   m_opt_crc=1; // on
00096   //
00097   m_kind=FILE5_KIND_OBJECT;
00098   m_kind_char='O';
00099   //
00100   m_dtype=FILE5_DTYPE_UNKNOWN;
00101   m_h5_dspace=-1;
00102   m_h5_dtype=-1;
00103   m_h5_dtype_size=0;
00104   m_h5_dtype_tofree=-1;
00105   m_h5_obj=-1;
00106   m_h5_status=0;
00107   //
00108   return affx::FILE5_OK;
00109 }

00121 std::string affx::File5_Object::file5_kind_string() {
00122   std::string kind_str="";
00123   if (is_open()) {
00124     attrib_get("file5-kind-string",&kind_str);
00125   }
00126   return kind_str;
00127 }

00129 int affx::File5_Object::set_file5_kind_string(const std::string& kind_str) {
00130   if (is_open()) {
00131     return attrib_set("file5-kind-string",kind_str);
00132   }
00133   return -1;
00134 }

00140 bool
00141 affx::File5_Object::is_open()
00142 {
00143   return (m_state==affx::FILE5_STATE_OPEN);
00144 }
00145 
00146 affx::File5_return_t
00147 affx::File5_Object::open(const std::string& name,int flags)
00148 {
00149   close();
00150   //
00151   if (flags!=affx::FILE5_OPEN) {
00152     FILE5_ABORT("Only 'affx::FILE5_OPEN' is allowed.");
00153   }
00154   //
00155   m_name=name;
00156   hid_t tmp_id=H5Dopen(h5_parent_id(),name.c_str());
00157   FILE5_CHECKID(tmp_id,"H5Dopen failed");
00158   m_h5_obj=tmp_id;
00159   //
00160   //parent_refcnt_inc();
00161   m_state=affx::FILE5_STATE_OPEN;
00162   return affx::FILE5_OK;
00163 }
00164 
00165 void affx::File5_Object::close_oid(hid_t* oid)
00166 {
00167   herr_t rv = 0;
00168 
00169   if (*oid==-1) {
00170     return;
00171   }
00172   //
00173   hid_t h5_type=H5Iget_type(*oid);
00174   switch (h5_type) {
00175   case H5I_ATTR:
00176     rv=H5Aclose(*oid);
00177     break;
00178   case H5I_DATASET:
00179     rv=H5Dclose(*oid);
00180     break;
00181   case H5I_DATASPACE:
00182     rv=H5Sclose(*oid);
00183     break;
00184   case H5I_DATATYPE:
00185     rv=H5Tclose(*oid);
00186     break;
00187   case H5I_FILE:
00188     rv=H5Fclose(*oid);
00189     break;
00190   case H5I_GROUP:
00191     rv=H5Gclose(*oid);
00192     break;
00193     //
00194   case H5I_BADID:
00195     FILE5_ABORT("H5I_BADID is unhandled.");
00196     break;
00197   default:
00198     FILE5_ABORT("unhandled case: oid="+ToStr(oid)+" type="+ToStr(h5_type));
00199     break;
00200   }
00201   //
00202   FILE5_CHECKRV(rv,"close_oid");
00203   *oid=-1;
00204 }
00205 
00206 affx::File5_return_t
00207 affx::File5_Object::close()
00208 {
00209   //
00210   m_h5_dtype=-1;
00211   close_oid(&m_h5_dtype_tofree);
00212   //
00213   close_oid(&m_h5_dspace);
00214   close_oid(&m_h5_obj);
00215   //
00216   m_state=affx::FILE5_STATE_CLOSED;
00217   //
00218   return affx::FILE5_OK;
00219 }

00237 
00238 affx::File5_return_t
00239 affx::File5_Object::dump1()
00240 {
00241   printf("   m_name      : '%s'\n",m_name.c_str());
00242   printf("   m_parent    : '%p'\n",m_parent);
00243   printf("   m_file      : '%p'\n",m_file);
00244   printf("   m_errno     : '%d'\n",m_errno);
00245   printf("   m_flags     : '%d'\n",m_flags);
00246   printf("   m_dirty     : '%d'\n",m_dirty);
00247   printf("   m_h5_dspace : '%d'\n",m_h5_dspace);
00248   printf("   m_h5_obj    : '%d'\n",m_h5_obj);
00249   printf("   m_h5_dtype  : '%d'\n",m_h5_dtype);
00250   printf("   m_h5_dtype_tofree : '%d'\n",m_h5_dtype_tofree);
00251   //
00252   return affx::FILE5_OK;
00253 }

00256 
00257 void affx::File5_Object::setParent(affx::File5_Group* parent)
00258 {
00259   // @todo: update refcnt.
00260   if (m_parent!=NULL) {
00261     m_parent->refcnt_dec(this);
00262   }
00263   m_parent=parent;
00264   setFile(NULL);
00265   if (m_parent!=NULL) {
00266     m_parent->refcnt_inc(this);
00267     m_readonly=m_parent->m_readonly;
00268     setFile(m_parent->getFile());
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 int
00273 affx::File5_Object::refcnt() {
00274   return m_refcnt;
00275 }
00276 
00277 int
00278 affx::File5_Object::refcnt_inc(affx::File5_Object* referrer) {
00279   // dont add ourselves (circular) or null
00280   if ((referrer==NULL)||(referrer==this)) {
00281     return m_refcnt;
00282   }
00283   //
00284 #ifdef FILE5_DEBUG_PRINT
00285   printf("== %c:%p->refcnt_inc(%c:%p)\n",
00286          file5_kind_char(),this,
00287          referrer->file5_kind_char(),referrer);
00288 #endif
00289   // is it in the list already?
00290   if (refcnt_has_referrer(referrer)==1) {
00291     printf("ERROR: %c:%p: referrer %p already in the list!\n",file5_kind_char(),this,referrer);
00292     return m_refcnt;
00293   }
00294   //
00295   m_refcnt++;
00296   m_refcnt_vec.push_back(referrer);
00297   //
00298   //refcnt_print();
00299   //
00300   return m_refcnt;
00301 }
00302 
00303 int
00304 affx::File5_Object::refcnt_has_referrer(affx::File5_Object* referrer)
00305 {
00306   // std::vector<void*>::iterator it;
00307   // unsorted.
00308   // it=find(m_refcnt_vec.begin(),m_refcnt_vec.end(),referrer);
00309   for (int i=0;i<m_refcnt_vec.size();i++) {
00310     if (m_refcnt_vec[i]==referrer) {
00311       return 1;
00312     }
00313   }
00314   return 0;
00315 }
00316 
00317 int
00318 affx::File5_Object::refcnt_dec(affx::File5_Object* referrer) {
00319   // 
00320   if ((referrer==NULL)||(referrer==this)) {
00321     return m_refcnt;
00322   }
00323   //
00324 #ifdef FILE5_DEBUG_PRINT
00325   printf("== %c:%p->refcnt_dec(%c:%p)\n",
00326          file5_kind_char(),this,
00327          referrer->file5_kind_char(),referrer);
00328 #endif
00329 //  if ((referrer==NULL)||(referrer==this)) {
00330 //    printf("ERROR: %c:%p: Dec of %c:%p\n",
00331 //           file5_kind_char(),this,
00332 //           referrer->file5_kind_char(),referrer);
00333 //    return m_refcnt;
00334 //  }
00335   //
00336   std::vector<affx::File5_Object*>::iterator it;
00337   int erase_cnt=0;
00338   //
00339   it=m_refcnt_vec.begin();
00340   for (int i=0;i<m_refcnt_vec.size();i++) {
00341     if (m_refcnt_vec[i]==referrer) {
00342       m_refcnt_vec.erase(it + i);
00343       i--;
00344       erase_cnt++;
00345       m_refcnt--;
00346     }
00347   }
00348   //
00349   if (erase_cnt==0) {
00350     printf("File5_Object::refcnt_dec(%p): Attempted to erase but not found.\n",referrer);
00351     refcnt_print();
00352     FILE5_ABORT("File5_Object::refcnt_dec()");
00353   }
00354   //
00355   return m_refcnt;
00356 }
00357 
00358 
00359 int
00360 affx::File5_Object::refcnt_print() {
00361   return refcnt_print(0);
00362 }
00363 
00364 int
00365 affx::File5_Object::refcnt_print(int indent) {
00366   std::string indent_str;
00367   indent_str.resize(indent,' ');
00368 
00369   printf("== %sReferences to %c:%p:  (cnt=%d) (size=%d)\n",
00370          indent_str.c_str(),
00371          file5_kind_char(),this,
00372          m_refcnt,int(m_refcnt_vec.size()));
00373   for (int i=0;i<m_refcnt_vec.size();i++) {
00374     affx::File5_Object* o=(affx::File5_Object*)m_refcnt_vec[i];
00375     printf("==   %s%2d: %c:%p '%s'\n",
00376            indent_str.c_str(),
00377            i,o->file5_kind_char(),o,o->m_name.c_str());
00378     if (o->refcnt()!=0) {
00379       o->refcnt_print(indent+3);
00380     }
00381   }
00382   //
00383   fflush(NULL);
00384   //
00385   return 0;
00386 }

00390 hid_t affx::File5_Object::h5_parent_id() {
00391   if (m_parent!=NULL) {
00392     return m_parent->m_h5_obj;
00393   }
00394   return m_h5_obj;
00395 }
00396 
00397 int affx::File5_Object::parent_refcnt_inc() {
00398   if (m_parent!=NULL) {
00399     return m_parent->refcnt_inc(this);
00400   }
00401   return 0;
00402 }
00403 int affx::File5_Object::parent_refcnt_dec() {
00404   if (m_parent!=NULL) {
00405     return m_parent->refcnt_dec(this);
00406   }
00407   return 0;
00408 }

00412 // FIXME: use H5E_BEGIN_TRY to just probe for it
00413 
00414 int
00415 affx::File5_Object::find_attrib_idx(const std::string& attrib_name)
00416 {
00417   int num_attrs;
00418   hid_t attrib_id;
00419   char attrib_name_buf[200];
00420 
00421   memset(attrib_name_buf,0,sizeof(attrib_name));
00422 
00423   num_attrs=H5Aget_num_attrs(m_h5_obj);
00424   for (int idx=0;idx<num_attrs;idx++) {
00425     attrib_id=H5Aopen_idx(m_h5_obj,idx);
00426     int attrib_name_len=H5Aget_name(attrib_id,sizeof(attrib_name_buf)-1,attrib_name_buf);
00427     H5Aclose(attrib_id);
00428     if ((attrib_name_len==attrib_name.size()) &&
00429         (strcmp(attrib_name_buf,attrib_name.c_str())==0)) {
00430       return idx;
00431     }
00432   }
00433   return -1;
00434 }
00435 
00436 //////////
00437 
00438 int
00439 affx::File5_Object::attrib_set_void(const std::string& attrib_name,hid_t h5_dtype,void* val_ptr)
00440 {
00441   hid_t attrib_space;
00442   hid_t attrib_id;
00443 
00444   //
00445   //printf("attrib_set_void('%s',%p)\n",attrib_name.c_str(),val_ptr);
00446 
00447   //
00448   FILE5_CHECKID(m_h5_obj,"attrib_set_void");
00449 
00450   // to overwrite, delete then create.
00451   attrib_delete(attrib_name);
00452 
00453   //
00454   attrib_space=H5Screate(H5S_SCALAR);
00455   attrib_id=H5Acreate(m_h5_obj,attrib_name.c_str(),h5_dtype,attrib_space,H5P_DEFAULT);
00456   m_h5_status=H5Awrite(attrib_id,h5_dtype,val_ptr);
00457   FILE5_CHECKRV(m_h5_status,"H5Awrite");
00458   //
00459   H5Sclose(attrib_space);
00460   H5Aclose(attrib_id);
00461   //
00462   return 0;
00463 }

00487 // @todo fixme this is a array of variable length not a single item with a variable length.
00488 int
00489 affx::File5_Object::attrib_set(const std::string& attrib_name,const std::string& val)
00490 {
00491   hid_t attrib_space;
00492   hid_t attrib_id;
00493   hid_t attrib_dtype;
00494 
00495   //
00496   FILE5_CHECKID(m_h5_obj,"attrib_set");
00497 
00498   //
00499   attrib_delete(attrib_name);
00500 
00501   //
00502   //printf("attrib_set_str('%s','%s')\n",attrib_name.c_str(),val.c_str());
00503 
00504   // make it just the right size.
00505   attrib_dtype=H5Tcopy(H5T_C_S1);
00506   H5Tset_size(attrib_dtype,val.size());
00507   // tmp ptr
00508   const char* val_ptr=val.c_str();
00509   //
00510   attrib_space=H5Screate(H5S_SCALAR);
00511   attrib_id=H5Acreate(m_h5_obj,attrib_name.c_str(),attrib_dtype,attrib_space,H5P_DEFAULT);
00512   m_h5_status=H5Awrite(attrib_id,attrib_dtype,val_ptr);
00513   FILE5_CHECKRV(m_h5_status,"H5Awrite");
00514   //
00515   H5Sclose(attrib_space);
00516   H5Aclose(attrib_id);
00517   H5Tclose(attrib_dtype);
00518   //
00519   return 0;
00520 }
00521 
00522 //////////
00523 
00524 int
00525 affx::File5_Object::attrib_get_void(const std::string& attrib_name,hid_t h5_dtype,void* val_ptr)
00526 {
00527   hid_t h5_attrib_space;
00528   hid_t h5_attrib_id;
00529 
00530   //
00531   // printf("attrib_get_void('%s',%p)\n",attrib_name.c_str(),val_ptr); // dbg
00532 
00533   //
00534   FILE5_CHECKID(m_h5_obj,"Invalid hdf5 object.");
00535 
00536   //
00537   h5_attrib_space=H5Screate(H5S_SCALAR);
00538   h5_attrib_id=H5Aopen_name(m_h5_obj,attrib_name.c_str());
00539   if (h5_attrib_id<0) {
00540     return -1;
00541   }
00542   m_h5_status=H5Aread(h5_attrib_id,h5_dtype,val_ptr);
00543   FILE5_CHECKRV(m_h5_status,"H5Aread");
00544   //
00545   H5Sclose(h5_attrib_space);
00546   H5Aclose(h5_attrib_id);
00547   //
00548   return 0;
00549 }
00550 
00551 int
00552 affx::File5_Object::attrib_get(const std::string& attrib_name,int* val)
00553 {
00554   int rv;
00555   rv=attrib_get_void(attrib_name,H5T_NATIVE_INT,val);
00556   // printf("attrib_get('%s')=%d\n",attrib_name.c_str(),*val); // dbg
00557   return rv;
00558 }
00559 
00560 int
00561 affx::File5_Object::attrib_get(const std::string& attrib_name,size_t* val)
00562 {
00563   int val_int;
00564   int rv;
00565   rv=attrib_get_void(attrib_name,H5T_NATIVE_INT,&val_int);
00566   // printf("attrib_get('%s')=%d\n",attrib_name.c_str(),(int)*val); // dbg
00567   *val=val_int;
00568   return rv;
00569 }
00570 
00571 int
00572 affx::File5_Object::attrib_get(const std::string& attrib_name,double* val)
00573 {
00574   return attrib_get_void(attrib_name,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,val);
00575 }
00576 
00577 int
00578 affx::File5_Object::attrib_get(const std::string& attrib_name,std::string* val)
00579 {
00580   hid_t attrib_id;
00581   hid_t attrib_dtype;
00582   int attrib_dtype_size;
00583   int attrib_idx;
00584   char* tmp_buf=NULL;
00585 
00586   attrib_idx=find_attrib_idx(attrib_name);
00587 
00588   if (attrib_idx<0) {
00589     *val="";
00590     return 1;
00591   }
00592 
00593   //
00594   attrib_id=H5Aopen_idx(m_h5_obj,attrib_idx);
00595   attrib_dtype=H5Aget_type(attrib_id);
00596   attrib_dtype_size=H5Tget_size(attrib_dtype);
00597   if (attrib_dtype_size==H5T_VARIABLE) {
00598     // variable size == HDF5 will allocate tmp_buf for us with malloc
00599     H5Aread(attrib_id,attrib_dtype,&tmp_buf);
00600   } 
00601   else {
00602     // known size == we allocate and HDF5 fills in.
00603     tmp_buf=(char*)malloc(attrib_dtype_size+1);
00604     FILE5_ASSERT(tmp_buf!=NULL);
00605     H5Aread(attrib_id,attrib_dtype,tmp_buf);
00606   }
00607   //
00608   val->assign(tmp_buf,attrib_dtype_size);
00609   //
00610   free(tmp_buf);
00611   H5Tclose(attrib_dtype);
00612   H5Aclose(attrib_id);
00613 
00614   return 0;
00615 }
00616 
00617 //////////
00618 
00619 int
00620 affx::File5_Object::attrib_delete(const std::string& attrib_name)
00621 {
00622   // doing a delete without it being present seems to raise an error.
00623 
00624   // look for it...
00625   int attrib_idx;
00626   attrib_idx=find_attrib_idx(attrib_name);
00627 
00628   // found it?
00629   if (attrib_idx>=0) {
00630     // delete it by name.
00631     H5Adelete(m_h5_obj,attrib_name.c_str());
00632   }
00633   //
00634   return 0;
00635 }
00636 
00637 ////
00638 
00639 int affx::File5_Object::get_objinfo(H5G_stat_t* statbuf)
00640 {
00641   m_h5_status=H5Gget_objinfo(m_h5_obj,".",0,statbuf);
00642   return m_h5_status;
00643 }
00644 
00645 int affx::File5_Object::get_name(std::string* str)
00646 {
00647   size_t str_size;
00648 
00649   // once to get the size
00650   str_size=H5Iget_name(m_h5_obj,NULL,0)+1; // null
00651   if (str_size==0) {
00652     *str="";
00653   }
00654   else {
00655     char* buf=(char*)malloc(str_size);
00656     FILE5_ASSERT(buf!=NULL);
00657     str_size=H5Iget_name(m_h5_obj,buf,str_size);
00658     *str=buf;
00659     free(buf);
00660   }
00661   return str_size;
00662 }
00663

00681 
00682 #ifdef FILE5_DEBUG_USAGE
00683 
00684 namespace affx {
00685   typedef std::map<affx::File5_Object*,int> file5_usecnt_t;
00686 }
00687 
00688 affx::file5_usecnt_t file5_usecnt;
00689 
00690 void affx::file5_usecnt_inc(affx::File5_Object* ptr)
00691 {
00692   affx::file5_usecnt_t::iterator i;
00693   int cnt=-1;
00694 
00695   i=file5_usecnt.find(ptr);
00696   if (i==file5_usecnt.end()) {
00697     file5_usecnt.insert(std::pair<affx::File5_Object*,int>(ptr,1));
00698     cnt=1;
00699   }
00700   else {
00701     i->second++;
00702     cnt=i->second++;
00703   }
00704   //
00705   printf("### file5_usecnt_inc: %c:%p=%3d '%s'\n",ptr->m_kind_char,ptr,cnt,ptr->m_name.c_str());
00706   fflush(NULL);
00707 }
00708 
00709 void affx::file5_usecnt_dec(affx::File5_Object* ptr)
00710 {
00711   affx::file5_usecnt_t::iterator i;
00712   int cnt=-1;
00713 
00714   i=file5_usecnt.find(ptr);
00715   if (i==file5_usecnt.end()) {
00716     printf("### file5_usecnt_dec: %p: not found!\n",ptr);
00717   }
00718   else {
00719     i->second--;
00720     cnt=i->second;
00721     if (i->second==0) {
00722       file5_usecnt.erase(i);
00723     }
00724   }
00725   
00726   printf("### file5_usecnt_dec: %c:%p=%3d '%s'\n",ptr->m_kind_char,ptr,cnt,ptr->m_name.c_str());  
00727   fflush(NULL);
00728 }
00729 
00730 void affx::file5_usecnt_print()
00731 {
00732   printf("========== File5 Usage ==========\n");
00733   int cnt=0;
00734   for (affx::file5_usecnt_t::iterator i=file5_usecnt.begin();i!=file5_usecnt.end();i++) {
00735     affx::File5_Object* ptr=i->first;
00736     printf("%3d: %c:%p=%3d '%s'\n",cnt++,ptr->m_kind_char,ptr,i->second,ptr->m_name.c_str());
00737   }
00738   printf("====================\n");
00739   fflush(NULL);
00740 }
00741 
00742 #endif
